data.description:
Whenever you hit with a Projected weapon, you can choose to deal 0 Harm and SEQUENCE all targets until the end of the encounter instead. SEQUENCED foes are permanently Primed.

When you use a power, you can choose to target any number of SEQUENCED foes instead of that powerʼs usual target, ignoring Band requirements and taking the powerʼs Drive Stress again for each target beyond the first.
